div.ab: zōt ud rāspīg: Šnūman, vid. VytVrS29.1; zōt: VytVrS29.4a-b, vid. Y25.4.

RecitationInstruction.ab: VytVrS29.4ShnumanAcc.a] KRA hšnwmn' MN ẔK Y YHWWNyt' wcʾltn' HT' hšnwmn' ʾhlwbʾn ptš YHWWNyt gwptn' staōmi zbaiiemi vīsaiiā̊ zaṇtumā̊ gwptn' OD OL Y vīspā̊ frauuaṣ̌aiiō (VytVrS30.10) 5020.

Nerangs.ab: (VytVrS29.3) ... vīspaca vohu mazdaδāta aṣ̌a.ciθra yazamaide hōm ud urwarām andar hāwan abganišn harw xšnūman kē ān ī bēd wizārdan (VytVrS29.4) agar xšnūman ahlawān padiš bēd guftan staōmi zbaiiemi ufiiemi...

"(After) (VytVrS29.3) vīspaca vohu mazdaδāta aṣ̌a.ciθra yazamaide, (the zōt) has to throw the hōm and urwarām into the hāwan. They should utter any corresponding šnūman (VytVrS29.4). If the šnūman contains ahlawān, they shoud recite staōmi zbaiiemi ufiiemi..."
